傡字的基本解释

傡
bìng
古同“併”。

傡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bìng］
［《廣韻》蒲迥切，上迥，並。］
亦作“傡1”。“竝1”的今字。
(1)平列。
(2)兼有；具有。
(3)皆是；都是。
(4)比并；相比。
(5)合并。
(6)指吞并。
(7)聚合；凑合。
(8)犹拼，，谓舍命相斗。
(9)似；如。
(10)副词。普遍；全都。
(11)副词。一起；一同。
(12)副词。用在否定词前面加强否定的语气。
(13)副词。犹甚至、连。常与“亦”连用，后多跟否定词，强调程度之深。
(14)而且；并且。
(15)表示两个动作同时进行。
(16)犹和，与。
[②]［bàng］
［《集韻》蒲浪切，去宕，並。］
亦作“傡2”。通“傍2”。
(1)挨着。
(2)依随。参见“並2世”。
(3)旁边。

傡字的康熙字典解释

【補遺】【子集】【人字部】　傡； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页114第05
【篇海類編】蒲孟切，鼓上聲。俱也，?也。又音?。義同。

傡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
傡字的起名意思

暂无。

傡
Basic explanation of words
傡
bìng
Ancient Tong "merged".
傡
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bìng］
["Guangyun" Pu Jiong cut, Shang Jiong, combined. ]
Also known as "傡1". The present character of "Ban 1".
(1) Parallel.
(2) Both; have.
(3) Both; both.
(4) Compare and compare;
(5) Merger.
(6) Refers to annexation.
(7) Aggregation; improvised.
(8) Still fighting, it is said that fighting with one's life.
(9) Like; such.
(10) Adverbs. Universal; all.
(11) Adverbs. Together
(12) Adverbs. Used in front of negative words to strengthen the negative tone.
(13) Adverbs. Still even, even. It is often used in conjunction with "yi", followed by negative words to emphasize the depth of the degree.
(14) And; and.
(15) means that two actions are performed at the same time.
(16) Juhe, and.
[②]［bàng］
["Ji Yun" Pu Lang cuts, goes down, and merges. ]
Also known as "傡2". Same as "Pong 2".
(1) Next to each other.
(2) Follow along. See "Union 2 Worlds".
(3) Next to it.
傡
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Addendum] [Subset] [The Department of Characters] 　傡; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 114, 05
[Articles of the sea category] Pu Mengqie, the sound of the drum. All too, too. Sound again? The same meaning.
